questions.question: Free vibrations is when system oscillates when excited:

explanations.a: In free vibrations no external forces are acting after initial excitation
explanations.b: In forced vibrations the system is periodically excited

explanations.a: The pendulum is excited once after the grandfather clock is keyed
explanations.b: The swing is pushed once, after which it stops after some time
explanations.c: The deflection of the beam is maximum in the beginnig and after some time it completely stops
explanations.d: Options a,b and c are examples of free vibrations
